couponTitle: Krispy Kreme Coupon: Products Starting at $1

couponTitle: Krispy Kreme Promo Code: $2 Off Your Order
couponDescription: Using this promo code, you will receive $2 off on your Krispy Kreme purchase.

couponDescription: Get 50% off your order at Krispy Kreme using this discount code during checkout.
